definition: something that provides direction or advice as to a decision or course of action, to give advice to
details:
noun
- something that provides direction or advice as to a decision or course of action
= synonyms: guidance
- a lawyer who pleads cases in court
= synonyms: counselor-at-law, pleader, advocate, counselor, counsellor
verb
- to give advice to
= example: to give advice to
= synonyms: rede, advise
